```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
#| fig-height: 10
#| fig-width: 3
penguins |>
  group_by(island) |>
  summarize(mean_bill_length = mean(bill_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = island,
      y = mean_bill_length,
      label = island,
      fill = island
    )
  ) +
  geom_col() +
  geom_text(
    size.unit = "pt",
    size = 12
  ) +
  labs(title = "Biscoe penguins have the longest bills on average")
```
